### Introduction

This vignette covers how to pull the clean 2020 UNAIDS Estimates from Google Drive to R. The MindTheGap package uses a cleaning function (`munge_unaids`) to process, munge, and tidy the UNAIDS HIV Estimates and `pull_unaids` to pull the cleaned data from Google Drive.
